<?php
require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/file.php';
require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/plugin-install.php';
require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/class-wp-upgrader.php';
require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/plugin.php';

// Download and install plugin from GitHub
$plugin_url = 'https://github.com/WEBLAZER/any-block-carousel-slider/archive/refs/heads/main.zip';
$upgrader = new Plugin_Upgrader();
$result = $upgrader->install($plugin_url);

// Rename directory if needed
$old_dir = WP_PLUGIN_DIR . '/any-block-carousel-slider-main';
$new_dir = WP_PLUGIN_DIR . '/any-block-carousel-slider';
if (file_exists($old_dir) && !file_exists($new_dir)) {
    rename($old_dir, $new_dir);
}
